name: Penguin's Platforming Christmas Adventure
description:
Help the Penguin collect all 28 presents scattered across a 3D Christmas-themed platformer course!

Created for the 32bit Holiday Jam 2021

Resolution can be adjusted by pressing Left/Right on the title screen.

Controls:

Arrows/WASD/Joystick : Movement

Space/Controller button : Jump/Interact

Source code: https://github.com/wojciech-graj/penguin-platformer
